name: @webstech/disable-amdppm
description: Set service start state to disabled.  Run as a scheduled task at startup.  If the service is set to run, update the registry to disabled and run shutdown to restart the machine.

scripts.pack: ( if exist %npm_config_local_prefix%%npm_package_config_pack_dir% (del /q %npm_config_local_prefix%%npm_package_config_pack_dir%\*) else mkdir %npm_config_local_prefix%%npm_package_config_pack_dir%) && npm pack --pack-destination=%npm_config_local_prefix%%npm_package_config_pack_dir% && ren %npm_config_local_prefix%%npm_package_config_pack_dir%\*-%npm_package_version%.tgz %npm_package_config_pack_file%%npm_package_version%.tgz

author: Chris. Webster <chris@webstech.net> (https://www.webstech.com/)
